summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5551 for the improvement of Latimer Place, as establish by Ordinance No. 65497, being the thirty foot street lying between 51st Avenue Northeast and 55th Avenue Northeast produced southerly, and extending from East 41st Street to East 41st Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 71649 as amended by Ordinance No. 71811, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
